alert.note: Alert for Evangeline; St. Landry (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 27 at 12:27AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN EVANGELINE AND NORTHWESTERN ST. LANDRY PARISHES THROUGH 100 AM CST... At 1227 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mamou, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ville Platte, Mamou, Basile, Washington, Chataignier, Whiteville, Reddell, Indian Lake, Grand Prairie, Chicot State Park, and Duralde. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 33 and 44. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
